Description:
Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)

Author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - Registry
Query: sourcetype="windows-*" target_object="*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\Compatibility Assistant\\Store\\C:\\Program Files\\Windows Media Player\\osk.exe" details="Binary Data"
